Description of APP 

Set in the mysterious Aperture Science Laboratories and known for his humorous writing, the game requires the player to solve puzzles and challenges by opening portals, maneuvering objects, and themselves moving through space in ways that used to be impossible.

Playing Portal today will teach you how to love a "companion cube", a computer named GLaDOS really wants you dead, and why your friends keep telling you 
"The cake is a lie." Throw it in NVIDIA SHIELD.
